attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: means test mps , why should millionairs be taking a wage from tax payers money ? the money saved could be used to increase the wages of mps whose sole income is from being an mp and all living allowances to be removed and replaced with rail season tickets with the option of overnight stays in a state owned property for the odd occasion they visit the commons

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
